Not having attained peace of mind,
I was overcome by lustful desire.
Raising my arms, I wept,

I approached a nun
who was my confidante.

Having listened to her Dhamma,

I knew my past lives,
and my divine eye was purified.

and my clairaudience was purified.
I realized psychic powers,
